# Introduction

```{r data imports}
install.packages("readxl")
library(readxl)

data1 <- read_excel("data import/Q1_data.xlsx")

View(data1)

str(data1)

data1$ID <- as.factor(data1$ID) # convert ID to factor
data1$Consent <- as.factor(data1$Consent) # convert consent to factor

# remove rows with missing values
data1 <- na.omit(data1)

# remove Sex values "PNTS"
data1 <- subset(data1, Sex != "PNTS")


# change "female" to "F"
data1$Sex[data1$Sex == "female"] <- "F"
data1$Sex[data1$Sex == "f"] <- "F"

#remove people who did not consent
data1 <- subset(data1, Consent == "0")


View(data1)

write.csv(data1, "data export/Q1_data_cleaned.csv", row.names = FALSE)

```
